tweet.text: In 2012, Secretary Albright received the Presidential Medal of Freedom from President Barack Obama. “In my professional life, what I am really proudest of is what we did in Kosovo. I was very concerned about what was happening in the Balkans.” https://t.co/G2tJwUlG21
